about_the_game:
Here are the premium animated decors for "Bonfyre Fest: Summer Event 2023"! Get 'em while they're hot!

Included Animated Items:
  • Splashy Cove
  • Tiki Bird Fence
  • Teddy Baywatch
  • Soda Mascot
  • Pool Glass Tiles

**PLEASE NOTE: Once you purchase these items, they are yours to permanently activate/ deactivate any time you'd like! Check the Decorations tab to access them any time.
If you already own any item from the list, purchasing this DLC will not provide you an extra set/ duplicate nor be discounted off of the final price. You will only receive the items you have yet to obtain.
